last_architect_output:
Iteration 28 -> B-CHECKPOINT-FIX COMPLETE. Fixed 2 bugs:

1. DOUBLE /_matrix/ PATH: matrixClient.js:24 sets baseUrl to '${window.location.origin}/_matrix' but Matrix SDK already adds '/_matrix/' internally, causing requests to hit '/_matrix/_matrix/client/v3/...' (404 error).

2. REACT ERROR RENDERING: Home.jsx:484 renders matrixError directly but it's an Error object, not a string. Must use matrixError?.message.

Required fixes:
- client/src/lib/matrixClient.js line 24: Remove '/_matrix' from fallback URL
- client/src/pages/Home.jsx line 484: Render matrixError?.message instead of matrixError

After fix, re-run manual browser tests to complete Milestone B checkpoint.
